channel.title: Help if you can plz
channel.description:
Im not 100% sure if there is a tut or something on this..... Does anyone no how to make somthing like a control panel that has the ingame commands set? i will add the commands but i need like a demo of one or one with atleast one command.
ex: pickup [box to write in] [same here] [the activate button to set the command]
